title: ASP error return
content: Hello, I am testing ASP files in the browser – and the return are unreadable characters! Why?- because I am living in Taiwan? But my chosen Language is English on my computer. How can I get an ASP error return in English readable? Thanks
creator: malte15715700

title: Black menu bar
content:
Since the last update the menu bar and tabs have turned black, nothing is visible. Does anyone know how to make it visible? I am using the latest version of firefox on debian properly updated.

Best regards.

Desde la última actualización la barra de menú y pestañas se ha puesto negra, no se ve nada. ¿Alguien sabe como hacerlo visible? Estoy usando la última versión de firefox en debian correctamente actualizado.

Un saludo.
creator: wmaldito

title: Constant updates
content:
Seriously??? I just downloaded an update yesterday, I haven't even installed it yet now Firefox wants to update again.

I've got two words for you, and they are not nice.

Will you PLEASE CUT IT OUT with the constant updates! I have work to do in other apps, like Outlook and Libre Office (google those). I can't be for you whatever you think I am here for! Using Firefox updates to get attention is not appropriate!
creator: joshua19

title: Gmail Pop-Up Notification for Firefox (Windows 10 22H2) No Longer Working
content: Desktop/Windows 10 Ver. 22H2... "Gmail Pop-Up Notification" no longer working. Went to my Gmail Setting, General, "Desktop notifications:" but still does not work
creator: benjaminegreene

title: twitter auto log in
content:
hi!

i always have to type in my email for desktop twitter log in, although both login ID and passwords are saved as autofill.

the password pops up, but how do i have my ID (email) pop up as well?

many thanks!
creator: avo

title: Saving to my Recipe Box
content:
Firefox won't save to my recipe box on : https://www.tasteofhome.com/recipes/bacon-macaroni-salad/

Works fine if I use Edge Browser.

title: Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information).--how to fix in firefox?
content:
tried to access these websites and got this error message --how does the problem get fixed?

https://frontline.news/post/1-5-million-android-users-affected-by-hidden-spyware-tied-to-china https://frontline.news/post/goya-cares-combats-child-trafficking-through-sound-of-freedom-film https://frontline.news/post/wef-summer-davos-attendees-promise-more-health-crises-cbdc-climate-punishments

this is happening all too often these days with links that did not used to have problems
